oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: First fire truck in Cleveland
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Demonstration of the town's first fire truck outside of the courthouse. Fire fighters are spraying the hoses up in the air for a group of spectators.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fires; Fire fighters; Clock towers
